snippet: No matter his flaws, Hugo Chávez’s passion for lifting up the poor is a lasting legacy.
abstract: Op-Ed article by former Brazilian Pres Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva contends that lasting legacy of Venezuela's Pres Hugo Chavez will be his passion for lifting up the poor, no matter what his other flaws were; contends that clear understanding of Chavez's significance is needed if South American leaders wish to define tasks facing continent.

byline.original: By LUIZ INÁCIO LULA da SILVA

lead_paragraph: No matter his flaws, Hugo Chávez’s passion for lifting up the poor is a lasting legacy.
